sentences.en: a large-format book for the partially-sighted
sentences.cn: 一本给弱视者阅读的大开本的书

sentences.en: A new format would alienate its ageing readership without attracting young readers.
sentences.cn: 新的版式会疏远上了年纪的读者群，并且也不会吸引年轻读者。

sentences.en: A second click of the Format - Undo button would reverse the italicize operation.
sentences.cn: 再输入更多的文本,按下格式撤销键,结果仅仅是段落的缩进撤销了.

sentences.en: better ways to format your spreadsheets
sentences.cn: 编排电子表格格式的更好方法

sentences.en: Consumers will not have to junk their old cassettes to use the new format.
sentences.cn: 消费者将不必丢弃他们的旧盒带而采用新的制式。

sentences.en: Courts have rules governing the format and content of briefs.
sentences.cn: 法院有专门规定案情摘要的形式和内容的规则.

sentences.en: He's just written a book: large format, nicely illustrated and not too technical.
sentences.cn: 他刚出了本书：大开本，插图精美，专业性也不太强。

sentences.en: I had met with him to explain the format of the programme and what we had in mind.
sentences.cn: 我已经和他当面解释了我们节目的形式以及我们的想法。

sentences.en: Most often, the IBM disk - track format is used, sometimes with minor variations.
sentences.cn: 大多数情况下, 使用IBM的磁盘磁道格式, 有时需要有少许变化.

sentences.en: Neither invocation of the format - Undo would affect the content.
sentences.cn: 第2次按下格式撤销键会恢复斜体操作,但格式撤销不会影响内容.

sentences.en: The courses were run to a consistent format.
sentences.cn: 这些课程的编排是有连续性的。

sentences.en: The format of the figure is very tasteful.
The leaflet is in PDF format.
The source program is written in a free field format.
sentences.cn: 原程序是按自由区段格式写书的.

sentences.en: The story is framed in a format that is part thriller, part love story.
sentences.cn: 情节的展开模式既像惊险小说，又像爱情故事。

sentences.en: They switched from set speeches to a question - and - answer format.
sentences.cn: 他们从事先准备好讲稿的演说转向一问一答的形式.

sentences.en: When you download the font it may be in a compressed format, such as a zip file.
sentences.cn: 下载的字体可能为压缩格式，如压缩文件包。

words.tran_cn: 形成的；造型的；格式化的
使正式；使有效（formalize的过去分词）；使定形；拘泥于形式
使形式化；使正式；拘泥礼仪

phrases.tran_cn: n. 通用格式；一般格式

trans.tran_cn: （出版物的）版式，[自]（数据安排的）形式，电视节目的总安排（或计划）
trans.tran_en: the size, shape, design etc, in which something such as a book or magazine is produced
to organize the space on a computer  disk  so that information can be stored on it

trans.tran_cn: 使格式化，安排…的格局，设计…的版面
trans.tran_en: to organize the space on a computer  disk  so that information can be stored on it
